title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Vanki Haaram
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with a delicate Hyderabadi polish. Adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds (VVS clarity
and a single ruby cabochon. Gold purity is stamped and guaranteed.
features: This Vanki Haaram showcases a classic South Indian design with a modern twist. It features a central panel with intricate filigree work and floral motifs, meticulously set with diamonds. The delicate vine-like design along the chain adds a touch of elegance. Emerald and diamond floral clusters provide a pop of color and sparkle. A solitary ruby cabochon sits at the center, bringing auspiciousness to the piece.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling white diamonds
complemented by rich green emeralds and a vibrant red ruby.
occasions: and other special occasions like Seemantham
or festive celebrations. Its modern design allows it to be worn with contemporary outfits for a touch of ethnic charm.
description: This Vanki Haaram is a testament to timeless craftsmanship and exquisite design. It's a statement piece that blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure lasting brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a unique luster, making it a valuable heirloom piece.
